column3: utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11472/commits/fa949d1bd6710358626eb70a47dfa101c0a60da2, storing paths as absolute is always a good precaution to prevent unexpected behavior.
> Should the same applies to cachedir?\n\nI think that makes sense (not sure it's in scope of this issue though).
Tested ACK fa949d1bd6710358626eb70a47dfa101c0a60da2.\n\n:+1: for the same treatment to cachedir
